titles.title: Providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules.
Providing for consideration of motions to suspend the rules.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-761, by Mr. Welch (VT).

It shall be in order at any time on the legislative day of Thursday, July 17, 2008, for the Speaker to entertain motions that the House suspend the rules relating to a measure concerning the domestic production of oil and natural gas.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 250.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1350.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 228 - 188 (Roll no. 509).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 194 (Roll no. 510).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Makes it in order at any time on July 17, 2008, for the Speaker of the House of Representatives to entertain motions that the House suspend the rules relating to a measure concerning the domestic production of oil and natural gas.
